edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api
Class GitFileSystemObject

java.lang.Object
  edu.nyu.cs.javagit.api.GitFileSystemObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
GitDirectory, GitFile
public abstract class GitFileSystemObject
extends java.lang.Object

GitFileSystemObject provides some implementation shared by files and directories
